name: Hero Escape - Stickman Edition
description: We follow the hero came to africa, where there are mysterious cannibal tribes, there are many dangerous beast, Your mission in sniper freedom is to assume the role of an elite sniper and assist the prisoner escape his captors. ,your task is to help the hero to clear the road barricades, allowing the hero successfully to escape.  be sure to save your bullets and try not to kill everything you see. after all, the best snipers are ghosts.
